{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-05T13:12:25.000Z", "description": "

Software Engineer required by a Digital Platform Company working on cutting edge projects such as Next-gen Mobility & Autonomous Automation. Their goal is to help the world\u2019s most ambitious companies build digital platforms and thriving ecosystems.


They are looking for a Software Engineer (Java) to join their team. (Fully remote option with offices in NYC, LA, Detroit, etc.)


The role:

  • 3+years\u2019 experience with Java and Spring
  • Experience with AWS or GCP
  • Experience with Devops and CI/CD tools, a plus


Compensation:

  • Up to $170,000 plus 10% bonus



If this Software Engineer Positon could be of interest please apply through this advert, or send a copy of your Resume to C.Gregoire@x4technology.us
